definition: one of the two edges that form the top and bottom parts of your mouth
the place on the edge of a glass or container where you pour out liquid
the edge of a high piece of land
a way of speaking to someone that shows you do not respect them
in: His thin red lips stretched into a smile.
Careful, the lip of the coffee pot is broken.
We walked up to the lip of the canyon.
give someone lip: Don’t give me any more of your lip, Sara!

definition: To kiss or make out with someone.

doors to pussy

To give someone lip is to talk back to them, to speak them in a disrespectful manor etc

Generally when someone speaks to someone significantly older then them with a level of disrespect, contempt and/or in a considending tone that shows they have no respect for their elder(s).
